product_name: Aqua Sphere Kayenne Lady Smoke Lens Swim Goggles - Women's
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Kayenne Lady Smoke Lens Swim Goggles reduce glare and offer excellent visibility in bright, outdoor light. Scratch-resistant Plexisol(R) synthetic resin lenses help keep your vision clear via antifog properties; plus, they offer 100% UVA and UVB protection. Stabilizing nose bridge offers a comfortable and secure fit. Hypoallergenic silicone-gasket skirt creates a watertight seal and feels soft against skin. Aqua Sphere Kayenne Lady Smoke Lens Swim Goggles secure the fit with a nonslip headstrap and easy-adjust, locking side buckles.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Kayenne Lady Smoke Lens Swim Goggles reduce glare and offer excellent visibility in bright, outdoor light.
